posts.post_content:
@ravens8856  
  
The card discarded with Liliana's +1 does not give [Lotleth Troll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotleth Troll) a +1/+1 counter. The discard is forced due to the planeswalker's ability; you have no option to discard that card to pay the cost of Troll's activated ability.

posts.post_content:
......  
yeah, I'd totally tap that. (searches Gatherer for things that tap Planeswalkers)  
  
(2 years later: [Ral Zarek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ral Zarek) taps her and untaps himself. oh yeah. ;D)  
  
Case File: Liliana Vess, A Vorthos Dissertation-- Part One  
*Lorywn*-- Liliana Introduced. Demonic debt hinted at. *Shards of Alara*-- [Nicol Bolas](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas) returns. [Malfegor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Malfegor) killed and eliminated as candidate for one of Liliana's Demon Masters. **Agents of Artifice**-- Liliana trades Demonic Debt for Bolas Debt, except that Bolas isn't even sure he can keep his promise, and it's not like he ever intended to anyway. I conclude they are about equal, that Liliana and Bolas could do it together, and that as Black-aligned Planeswalkers that both have a love of pacts, deceit, and betrayal, the idea of using basically White strategy (alliance) is insane. We know these are the Top Dawg Demons because Bolas fears their combined power.   
  
**Curse of the Chain Veil** (cance... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
......
yeah, I'd totally tap that. (searches Gatherer for things that tap Planeswalkers)

(2 years later: Ral Zarek taps her and untaps himself. oh yeah. ;D)

Case File: Liliana Vess, A Vorthos Dissertation-- Part One
Lorywn-- Liliana Introduced. Demonic debt hinted at. Shards of Alara-- Nicol Bolas returns. Malfegor killed and eliminated as candidate for one of Liliana's Demon Masters. Agents of Artifice-- Liliana trades Demonic Debt for Bolas Debt, except that Bolas isn't even sure he can keep his promise, and it's not like he ever intended to anyway. I conclude they are about equal, that Liliana and Bolas could do it together, and that as Black-aligned Planeswalkers that both have a love of pacts, deceit, and betrayal, the idea of using basically White strategy (alliance) is insane. We know these are the Top Dawg Demons because Bolas fears their combined power.

Posted By: DarthParallax (4/24/2013 5:25:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
+1, Card Neutral  
-2, Card Advantage  
-6. Big flashy spell ([choice of damnations](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=choice of damnations))  
  
I was thinking she may work as a 2-of in Legacy MBC by replacing a pair of removal spells with her. She allows repeatable card-advantage when you use her right. (Dump your hand so the +1 becomes an advantage. Do this in the midst of making the opponent sac two creatures.)
posts.html:
+1, Card Neutral
-2, Card Advantage
-6. Big flashy spell (choice of damnations)

I was thinking she may work as a 2-of in Legacy MBC by replacing a pair of removal spells with her. She allows repeatable card-advantage when you use her right. (Dump your hand so the +1 becomes an advantage. Do this in the midst of making the opponent sac two creatures.)
